body:
Comment 4: 
Wow. I had never even heard of multistream, but researching it looks like this is how
tools like pbzip2 work. I'd wager a small amount of money that this is case here.

For example, http://chaosinmotion.com/blog/?p=723 suggests that multistream zips contain
additional data after an EOF marker.
_Labels changed: added **priority-later**, removed **priority-soon**._ _Status changed to **Accepted**._
